original_text: While she was giving birth, one baby put out his hand. The woman who was helping Tamar tied a red string to that baby's arm. She said, ‘This baby came out first.’
korean_text: 해산할 때에 손이 나오는지라 산파가 이르되 이는 먼저 나온 자라 하고 홍색 실을 가져다가 그 손에 매었더니

sentences.original_text: one baby put out his hand.
The woman who was helping Tamar
tied a red string to that baby's arm.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 아기의 팔에 빨간 끈을 묶었습니다.
